name: QX HEXAGONS Clean
description:
An update ad block for qruiser.com.

Besides hiding the ads, this style also removes a lot of annoyances scattered all over the site.
css:
/*!*****************************************
	QRUISER HEXAGON CLEAN
	Theme Name: QX Hexagon Clean
	Theme URI: https://qruiser.com
	Description: A modernized theme for qruiser.com
	Version: 2.0.2
	Author: Bjarne Var√∂ystrand
	www: varoystrand.se
	GitHub: github.com/BlackSkorpio/qx-hexagon
	QX: www.qruiser.com/?id=469474
******************************************/
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document regexp("(^http|https):\/\/(|www\.)qruiser\.(.[a-z]{1,4}).*$"){#qruiser-panorama,#column_center .standardbanner,#goldmemberbanner.standardbanner.warningbanner,hr.dotline,div#stripe,div#ads,div[style="margin:auto auto auto 1px;height:55px;width:1024px;border:0;overflow:hidden;"]{display:none!important}}
